data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Birmingham get the game underway.
Maxime Colin puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 27, Goal! Britt Assombalonga levels the match at 1-1.
Goal! Middlesbrough have got their heads in front thanks to a George Saville strike.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Stephen Martin blows to start the second-half. Middlesbrough with the kick-off.
Aitor Karanka is making the team's first substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Ivan Sunjic replacing Mikel San Jose.
Maikel Kieftenbeld is replacing Adam Clayton for Birmingham at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
In the minute 56, Goal! Lewis Wing extends Middlesbrough's lead to 1-3.
Lukas Jutkiewicz is replacing Jon Toral for the home team.
The home team have replaced Ivan Sanchez with Jonathan Leko. This is the fourth substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
In the minute 61, Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a fifth substitution, with Gary Gardner replacing Jeremie Bela.
The away team have replaced Marvin Johnson with Djed Spence. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
Middlesbrough take a comfortable 1-4 lead thanks to Lewis Wing.
In the minute 83, Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a second substitution, with Chuba Akpom replacing Britt Assombalonga.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-4.
